context: Hey, How are you? Can you recommend some movies to watch? I can watch anything, it doesn't matter the genre

I liked The Hurt Locker (2008) and PT 109 (1963) too
I loved The Hurt Locker (2008) such a good movie I haven't seen the other, though
resp: If you like horror I liked Frozen (2010)
